Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 32 points and 10 rebounds
Nick Richards added 15 points and 12 rebounds off the bench
Devin Booker had 39 points and 10 assists, Kevin Durant added 26 points for the Suns
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlotte dominated Phoenix on the glass, outrebound the Suns 59-42
Others: This was only the third game this season — and first time for back-to-back games — the Hornets' starting five were on the floor together
Both teams are in action Thursday night with the Suns hosting the Hawks, and the Hornets visiting the Lakers
